group.name: Social Innovation and Service Design Meetup

description:
Hello and welcome! Let's get this group started! Come out to our first Meet Up to grab a drink to meet everyone and learn about how design can create social impact. This Meet Up is aimed at anyone interested in using design to tackle social problems and creating real change. During this kickoff meetup we'll talk about what everyone is working on right now (even if it's just an idea), what you need help with and what our ambitions are for this Meetup Group. I look forward to meeting everyone and don't hesitate to bring a friend!

Hope to see you there!

venue.name: Micro Marche / Via Via Cafe
venue.address_1: 9 Quai de la Houille, Saint Catherine

name: Kick-off Meetup

group.name: Social Innovation and Service Design Meetup

description:
Inspired by the yearly Feast for Good global dinner parties, we are organizing a smaller version in Brussels on the same day, Oct. 11 at 7pm but with a different format. 'Feast for Good' is a social impact conference in New York, paired with a global dinner party that brings changemakers together to imagine a brighter future for our cities. 

These dinner parties are happening in 40+ cities across 6 continents. The goal is to spark new ideas and collaboration that drives local entrepreneurs and social initiatives forward. The theme this year is Progression: we envision a world where people are empowered to love what they do. Guests choose a common issue and who to sit with over dinner - and instead of talking about problems, they talk about ways to support each other, collaborate, and make our city work better.


At the end of the dinner, we'll seal the night with a commitment: one small action we can take to move our city forward. Our potluck dinner is about connecting with each other over a simple meal and participating in a global problem solving session. 

Hope to see you there!



What is a potluck? 
 A potluck is gathering of people where each person brings a dish of food to be shared among the group. This is a way to have everyone be able to attend and to distribute the costs among the participants.
name: Feast for Good potluck
